question: The two embryonic hemoglobins are:
exp: - Gower and Poland Hb are seen in the embryonic period. - Fetal Hb is predominantly seen after the embryo changes to a fetus HEMOGLOBIN TYPES AT DIFFERENT STAGES OF LIFE:

question: RBC Lifespan in preterm babies:
exp: LIFE SPAN OF RBC: - Pre term neonates - 40-60 days - Term neonates - 90 days - Older children/ Adults - 120 days
